item.title: Finding price trends and top neighbourhoods for affordable stays using Seattle Airbnb data
item.description: unsplash-logoPhoto by Kelsey Dody on Unsplash Introduction As part of the Udacity - Data Science Nano Degree program I recently completed a task where I had to use a given data set, analyse it and ask between 3-5 questions related to the business or real-world context of the data. And then each question must be answered with appropriate visualization, table, or statistic.
